Author: ProMac - ver. 1.0 - 22.11.2018: Builder Base Attack for BH level 5 ~ 6
Attack: GiCart
When "Random Attack" Check Bot will select CSV troops from attack bar automatically
Will drop Giants & Cannon, on opposite Crusher side
Side FRONT by default will be best side to attack where doesn't have defense and as far as possible from it;
DROP_SIDE: FRONT - BACK - LEFT - RIGHT (red lines)
DROP_SIDE: BH - Builder Hall side will attack Only if exposed
DROP_SIDE: EDGEB - Will detect if exist Buildings on Corners
DROP_POINTS: Each side will have 10 points 1-10 , the 5 is the Middle , 1 = closest to BuilderHall
DROP_POINTS: Can Be Defined Like e.g Single Drop Point(5),Multi Drop Points(2,4,6),Multi Start To End(2-6)
TROOPNAME : Arch , Barb , BabyDrag , Beta , Bomb, Cannon , Drop , Giant , Machine , Night , Pekka
ADDTILES: Is the distance from the red line. 1 Default Do Nothing - e.g (2) Means ADD 2 tile to drop point
QTY: 1,2,3 integer value quantity of troops, QTY=ALL Will act like remain for that troop and drop all of only that troops.(NOTE:QTY=ALL will use external edges)
CAMP: Define Camp(Slots) troops these define troops will be selected from BB attack bar this command will make sure u have correct troops according to CSV.
Camp 1

Air Defenses

column7: Force the FRONT side to be the detectable building , 0/1 = Off/On , select just ONE
